sentences.sentence: They gave tips to porters taxi-drivers bellboys waiters and so on.
sentences.translation: 他们对搬运工、出租汽车司机、旅馆侍者、服务员等等都给小费。

sentences.sentence: They gave tips to porters, taxi-drivers, bellboys, waiters, and so on.
sentences.translation: 他们对搬运工、出租汽车司机、旅馆侍者、服务员等等都给小费。

sentences.sentence: Staff from Front Office: Two bellboys will carry a stretcher to help any injured guests.
sentences.translation: 前台消防队员：两名行李员将担架备于消防电梯厅准备接受伤员；
